name: Auroron
description: Auroron is an elusive and mysterious legendary pokemon, often found inhabiting bustling city-like environments. It wears a dazzling golden crystal headband, which it sometimes uses to manipulate the energy of its surroundings. On sunny days, Auroron will bask in the glow of the sun, charging itself up with electricity. On rainy days, it can call down powerful storms to create a dazzling light show, illuminating its surroundings with vivid flashes of lightning.
image_prompt: Auroron::0 a legendary electric-type boar pokemon::2.5, wearing a golden crystal headband, in a city environment, lightning background, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
